divs: Sighting Detailsi usually go out for a smoke and I sat in the chair that on the porch, I alway look to the sky. either at planes or just looking. this early morning as i was looking toward the North I saw this Oblong shape hovering in the sky. At first I thought it was a helicopter hovering, but the three light from this object was one above the other. and all lit. and just below the object it flow one of the L A X planes Im sure they saw it. I set out there for a while and after I smoked the whole cigarette and watch the object not move at all with the air planes flying under them this thing did not move at all. I brush it off as something the sky and went back in the house after watch this thing for over a hour. just to see if it will move but it didn't so I just went to bed. It was so far away My camera wouldn't pick it up so I didn't even bother taking pictures. I like to know if it was any reports of this object from pallet. and sorry for the mis-spell words.
Summary: Cigar shape Hovered in sky. Over plane route, Im sure planes saw it.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around September 30th 2013
